title: Facebook Added Over $350 Billion In Value Since 2016. Can It Repeat?
text: Facebook’s market cap has more than doubled since the end of 2016, with the company valued at roughly $720 billion as of August 2020. In effect, the company added over $350 billion in value or roughly 4x the current market capitalization of Twitter, Snap, and Pinterest combined.
